title: Happy Birthday, Lanzhu-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Heave ho... Did I make too much......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Oh, You. That’s a big box. Do you want me to carry it for you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah! No, I’m okay! I can carry it on my own!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>But it looks like you’re having some trouble moving it. Leave it to me. What the heck is even in this huge box...... AH!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahh! You saw it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You made cupcakes for my birthday party! You made them just for today! And they’re rainbow-colored! You know just how much I love Nijigaku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I didn’t think the surprise would be spoiled like this......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>These are amazing! I love them, You! Thank you for preparing such an amazing surprise!! Come on, let’s head to the clubroom. I’m gonna have this cupcake. Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wait, wait! We’re celebrating you today. On top of spoiling the surprise, you shouldn’t be the one carrying it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I don’t mind.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I do! You’re today’s protagonist! The princess! That’s why I have to be the one to pick out a cupcake for you, put it on your plate, and light the candle for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyah! Okay, okay! Hurry up, you! Let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>And we all have to wish you a happy birthday~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
